column1: Neem Ka Thana is a town in Sikar district in the Rajasthan state of India. It is one of the nine sub division of the district.

column3: 000 Males constitute 53% of the population and females 47%. 16% of the population is under 6 years of age. It has an average literacy rate of 67%
column4: higher than the national average of 59.5%. Male literacy is 77%
column5: and female literacy is 56%. Neem ka thana is an important commercial center of Shekhawati region of Rajasthan. The total area of the current neem ka thana station Municipality in 1016 hectares (according to 2015).
